Hugh Grant stars as the lovable but struggling musician, and Drew Barrymore shines as his lyric-writing partner.

If you're looking for something more modern, "We Are Your Friends" is another great option. This 2015 film stars Zac Efron and features a coming-of-age story set in the world of electronic dance music. It's a fun and uplifting movie that explores themes of self-discovery and friendship.
